name: 廖義田
objective:
本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。
溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。
?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.
The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.
Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.
schedule:
1-4,statistic mechanics of polymer chain, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory,phase separation, excluded volume.
5-8, osmotic pressure,sedimentation , GPC molecular weight,dynamic light scattering.neutron scattering.
9-12,polymer  surface and interface, polymer  colloid,molecular force,
13-16, polymer  spectroscopy,FTIR,Raman,, NMR, Application of  polymer chemistry in
nanotechnology,such as graphene,,CNT, Clay, and optoelectrronic industry.

1, Notes,

3,Macnight, introduction to polymer viscoelasticity
